mapper.insert: insert into PRODUCT(prod_enddate, prod_category, prod_writer, prod_name, prod_price, prod_count, prod_discount, prod_purchase_yn, prod_content, prod_comment) values(#{prod_enddate}, #{prod_category}, #{prod_writer}, #{prod_name}, #{prod_price}, #{prod_count}, #{prod_discount}, #{prod_purchase_yn}, #{prod_content}, #{prod_comment})
